languages.text: "Это утверждение ложно, но предсказуемо. Откровения Омниссии шокируют темный разум, не способный принять и понять их праведную суть".

traits.locale_text: "Это утверждение ложно, но предсказуемо. Откровения Омниссии шокируют темный разум, не способный принять и понять их праведную суть".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by the Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение ложно, но предсказуемо. Откровения Омниссии шокируют темный разум, не способный принять и понять их праведную суть".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的，但这样的错误可以预见。欧姆尼塞亚赐予我的祝福令了那些无知的灵魂震惊不已。他们无法接受、理解祂正义的智慧。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by the Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的，但这样的错误可以预见。欧姆尼塞亚赐予我的祝福令了那些无知的灵魂震惊不已。他们无法接受、理解祂正义的智慧。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es falsa pero predecible. Las revelaciones concedidas por el Omnissiah conmocionan a una mente ignorante incapaz de comprender su justa sabiduría».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by the Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es falsa pero predecible. Las revelaciones concedidas por el Omnissiah conmocionan a una mente ignorante incapaz de comprender su justa sabiduría».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は誤りであるが、予測できる。万機神から授けられた啓示は、その正しい英知を受け入れ、理解することのできない無知な心に衝撃を与えるものだ」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by the Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は誤りであるが、予測できる。万機神から授けられた啓示は、その正しい英知を受け入れ、理解することのできない無知な心に衝撃を与えるものだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt, aber vorhersehbar. Die vom Omnissiah gewährten Offenbarungen schockieren den ignoranten Verstand, der nicht in der Lage ist, ihre rechtschaffene Weisheit zu akzeptieren und zu begreifen."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by the Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt, aber vorhersehbar. Die vom Omnissiah gewährten Offenbarungen schockieren den ignoranten Verstand, der nicht in der Lage ist, ihre rechtschaffene Weisheit zu akzeptieren und zu begreifen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée, quoique prévisible. Les révélations accordées par l'Omnimessie sont difficiles à supporter pour les ignorants, dont l'esprit est incapable d'accepter et de comprendre la sagesse. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by the Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée, quoique prévisible. Les révélations accordées par l'Omnimessie sont difficiles à supporter pour les ignorants, dont l'esprit est incapable d'accepter et de comprendre la sagesse. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by the Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış ancak öngörülebilir. Hermesih'in bahşettiği aydınlanmalar; kabullenme ve onların dosdoğru bilgeliğini idrak etme becerisine sahip olmayan, bihaber zihinleri şoka uğratabilmekte."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false yet predictable. The revelations granted by the Omnissiah shock the ignorant mind unable to accept and comprehend their righteous wisdom."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış ancak öngörülebilir. Hermesih tarafından bahşedilen aydınlanmalar, kabullenme ve onların dosdoğru bilgeliğini idrak etme becerisine sahip olmayan bihaber zihinleri şoka uğratabilmekte."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
